events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and will review your materials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering team, focusing on software development roles.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case and will guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We conducted the initial screening and are impressed with your experience in software engineering.
Thank you for responding promptly to our interview scheduling request; this helps us move forward efficiently.
Your technical interview with our senior developers has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 2 PM UTC.
